text:
The aim is to clean a Cookie with more flexibility than today.

See:

- http://stackoverflow.com/questions/12707635/how-to-clear-jsessionid-of-each-threaduser-in-jmeter-on-demand

- http://stackoverflow.com/questions/12670264/simulating-interaction-between-two-users-in-jmeter

text:
Feature is in fact available through:
- Result Status action Handler
- If Controller + Test Action


So adding a function for this is not necessary
